name: Amber & White Ginger
description:
These generously sized bars of goat's milk soap are scented with the warm, rich, notes of amber, and white ginger, with a lightly floral back note. The fragrance of this soap is a year around favorite, but the surface of this soap is festively robed in gold, and copper, mica, just in time for the holiday season.

Fragrance: Fragrance Oil

Approximate Weight: 5 oz per bar

Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Fragrance Oil, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Almond Butter, Sodium Lactate, Beeswax, Brazilian Clay, Mica

name: Blackberry & Sage
description:
This soap has a luxurious creamy lather, with just the right amount of bubbles. The fragrance is light, and fruity, but not excessively sweet, or jammy, and is grounded with a delicate back note of garden sage.

Fragrance: Fragrance Oil

Approximate Weight: 5 oz per bar

Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Fragrance Oil, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Almond Butter, Beeswax, Brazilian and Dead Sea Clays

name: Bergamot & Grapefruit
description: Rich in goat's milk, and heavy on the shea butter, but light on the skin. The bright, citrus aroma of bergamot, paired with the uplifting scent of pink grapefruit. Clean, and crisp, this refreshingly scented soap appeals to everyone. Estimated Restock Date: January 22nd, 2014 Fragrance: Essential Oils Approximate Weight: 5 Oz Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Shea Butter, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Castor Oil, Essential Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Avocado Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Almond Butter, Sodium Lactate, Beeswax, Brazilian Clay

name: Cucumber & Melon
description: This goat milk soap has been given a face lift for 2014! The fragrance and base soap formula is the same, but this season the bars are larger, and the surface of the soap has a beautiful swirl design. This is a crisp and refreshing, not too sweet, cucumber scent, paired with the subtle aroma of melon, and a customer favorite! Estimated Restock Date: January 6th, 2014 Fragrance: Fragrance Oil Approximate Weight: 5 oz Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Annatto Infused Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Shea Butter, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Fragrance Oil, Almond Butter, Beeswax, Dead Sea Clay, Titanium Dioxide

name: Kitchen Meyer Lemon
description: New for 2014! Not as brightly scented as a standard lemon, this soap has a warm, mellow, earthy citrus scent, typical of a Meyer Lemon, with a rich, nourishing lather. Perfect for the kitchen to condition those hardworking hands! Estimated Release Date: January 3, 2014 Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Shea Butter, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Fragrance Oil, Almond Butter, Beeswax, Brazilian Clay, Titanium Dioxide

name: Lavender & Alkanet Root
description: We've had a number of requests for a pure lavender essential oil scented soap, so this is a new release for 2014! This goat milk soap is scented with the best Lavender Essential Oil we could find, that is not too camphorous, and is colored with an infusion of natural alkanet root powder. Estimated Release Date: January 6th, 2014 Fragrance: Essential Oil Approximate Weight: 5 oz Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Alkanet Root Infused Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Shea Butter, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Fragrance Oil, Almond Butter, Beeswax, Titanium Dioxide

name: Lavender and Litsea
description:
Here for a limited time only, this unique hand-milled soap has a simple, clean, fresh blend of Lavender, and Litsea cubeba essential oils. Lightly floral, with a citrus note, this soap contains calendula infused organic olive oil, and dried calendula petals scattered throughout the soap as a mild exfoliant.  With its creamy lather, this soap has become a favorite in the farm  kitchen for cleaning, and conditioning, hard-working hands. 

SOLD OUT!

Approximate Weight: 4 oz 

Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Coconut Oil, Calendula Infused Organic Olive Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Cocoa Butter, Avocado Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Shea Butter, Lavender Essential Oil, Castor Oil, Beeswax, Dried Calendula Petals

name: Oatmeal, Milk & Honey
description: This lightly scented soap is great for the whole family. It contains finely ground oatmeal, as a natural exfoliant, with lots of creamy goat milk, and sweet raw honey from our hives. Estimated Restock Date: January 20th, 2014 Fragrance: Fragrance Oil Approximate Weight: 5.0 Oz Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Fragrance Oil, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Almond Butter, Raw Honey, Ground Oatmeal, Beeswax

name: Spiced Pumpkin
description:
A comforting, warm, and spicy, aroma reminiscent of Autumn, with cinnamon, clove, and allspice. This soap is made with our fresh goat's milk, and also includes fresh winter squash puree. Although it requires a couple of extra weeks to cure before we can offer it for sale, we think you'll agree that the wait is more than worth it!

Fragrance: Fragrance Oil

Approximate Weight: 5 Oz

Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Pumpkin Puree, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Fragrance Oil, Almond Butter, Sodium Lactate, Beeswax, Titanium Dioxide, Mica

name: The Woodsman
description:
This limited edition rustic hand-milled soap has a wonderfully earthy fragrance that appeals to men and women alike. This soap contains extra goat milk for hard-working hands, and is scented with base notes of patchouli, and a hint of orange. Background notes of musk, elemi, citrus, lavender, and pine, all blend to create a warm, alluring fragrance. This unique soap is scented with a blend of both essential, and fragrance oils.

Fragrance: Essential and Fragrance Oil Blend

Approximate Weight: 5 Oz

Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat Milk, Organic Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Essential Oil, Fragrance Oil, Almond Butter, Beeswax, Dried Calendula Petals

name: Unscented Goat Milk Soap
description:
Goat's milk soap, plain and simple, with extra shea butter, and a nourishing creamy lather. Fragrance, and additive free.

Fragrance: Unscented

Approximate Weight: 5 Oz

Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Shea Butter, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil,  RSPO Palm Oil, Castor Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Avocado Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Almond Butter, Beeswax

name: White Tea & Ginger
description: A delightful, and delicately floral scent, with hints of hyacinth, citrus, and musk. This soap contains all natural yellow Brazilian clay, for color, with green sea clay contrasting leaves. Estimated Restock Date: January 3rd, 2014 Fragrance: Fragrance Oil Approximate Weight: 5 oz per bar Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat’s Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Fragrance Oil, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Almond Butter, Beeswax, Brazilian and Dead Sea Clays

name: Wintertide
description: Reminiscent of a fresh snowfall, on a cool winter's day, this soap has a clean, crisp scent, that can be enjoyed year around. Sea clay and mica decorative leaves on the surface of the soap add a little winter cheer. Estimated Restock Date: January 6th, 2014 Fragrance: Fragrance Oil Approximate Weight: 5 oz per bar Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Fragrance Oil, Almond Butter, Sodium Lactate, Beeswax, Titanium Dioxide, Dead Sea Clay, Mica

name: Winter Woodland
description:
This special seasonal soap incorporates a blend of our traditional goat milk soap with a layer of sea clay soap as a mild oil-aborbing, exfoliant. The fragrance is reminiscent of Siberian Fir, Mistletoe, and Clove, with a backnote of fresh Grapefruit, and Lily.

Fragrance: Fragrance Oil

Approximate Weight: 5 oz per bar

Ingredients: Nigerian Dwarf Goat Milk, Organic Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, RSPO Palm Kernel Oil, Rice Bran Oil, RSPO Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Fragrance Oil, Almond Butter, Beeswax, Titanium Dioxide, Dead Sea Clay, Iron Oxide

name: Bee's Bliss Lip Balm
description: Made from all natural ingredients, these hand crafted lip balms are rich in beeswax to protect your lips from the harsh winter elements. Each tube contains plenty of lip-nourishing shea butter, and oil from the seeds of the California native wildflower, White Meadowfoam. Container: Twist Tube with Tamper Evident Tab Net Wgt: 0.2 oz Ingredients (Unflavored): Beeswax (Cera Flava), Coconut Oil (Cocons nucifera), Shea Butter (Butyrospermum parkii Fruit), Sweet Almond Oil (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis), Avocado Oil (Persea gratissima), Limnanthes alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Vitamin E Oil (Tocopherol) Ingredients (Flavored): Beeswax (Cera Flava), Coconut Oil (Cocons nucifera), Shea Butter (Butyrospermum parkii Fruit), Sweet Almond Oil (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis), Avocado Oil (Persea gratissima), Limnanthes alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Flavor Oil, Vitamin E Oil (Tocopherol)

name: Farmer's Market Tote
description:
Sporting our unique Farm Woman logo these unbleached, 100% cotton, sturdy canvas tote bags have plenty of room to carry your produce home from the farmer's market.

Our bags have extra long handles for ease of carrying, and our farm logo is printed on both sides of the bag.

Constructed of heavyweight cotton canvas, with full side, and bottom gussets.

Machine washable.

Each bag measures 15" x 18" x 6"
